Lines: Explosives set up around the base will be ignited al
at once, giving a chance for our Gallop to break through
the encirclement and escape to base willing to accept us.
Leo, aren't you being a bit too pushy?
Wouldn't it be better to use MS as diversion?
Its not something that three MS can stop.
Hey, its okay, its gonna be fine.
Captain, our Gallop is ready to escape.
...is it really okay to discard our MS?
We'll need to lighten our load as much as possible
to break through at full speed.
I'm going to setoff explosives then go as well.
